descriptionHtml:
Name: Ebony Blade replacer
Version: 1.0
Date: EU 20-12-11  NA 12-20-11
Category: Weapons
Author(s): 5444497
Source: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4004 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1449

Description
===========
Hey guys, here is an ebony blade replacer-mod.
This mod is a replacer for the ebony blade, wich is only  obtainable via the whispering door quest (mephala\'s quest), or with console commands.
It changes the model with one from 747823. http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1449
And uses an awesome retex from feuerkorn 
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4004
Location
========
Dragons reach

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, enjoy ;)

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Credits
=======
All credits go to feuerkorn and 747823 for there model and texture
I used 747823\'s model, you can find it here:http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1449


I also used feuerkorn\'s texture edit, you can find it here:
http://fallout3nexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4004
Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator - http://lhammonds.game-host.org/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You must contact me and the obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod (and i mean if you want the replacer in an overhaul mod or something).
You must contact feuerkorn and\\or 747823 to obtain their permission before re-packaging any part of this mod (this time im talking about the sword and texture).
